label: LineTradeSettlement
comment: The information, at a line level, that enables the reconciliation of a financial transaction with the item(s) that the financial transaction is intended to settle, for example a commercial invoice.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code, specifying the direction, either an addition or subtraction, for the amount of this line trade settlement.
A code specifying a type of creditor reference for this line trade settlement.
The indication of whether or not a discount applies to the item in this line trade settlement.
The date, time, date time or other date time value of the invoice in this header trade settlement.
The invoice issuer reference, expressed as text, for this header trade settlement.
The payer reference, expressed as text, for this header trade settlement.
A payment reference, expressed as text, for this header trade settlement.
The code specifying the price currency for this header trade settlement.
A code specifying a status for this trade product.

objectProperties.comment: Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.
A trade related fiscal levy or duty.
Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.
A document line associated with this line trade settlement.
Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.
The party to whom an invoice is issued for this header trade settlement.
A specific trade account for recording debits and credits to general accounting, cost accounting or budget accounting.
A specific trade account for recording debits and credits to general accounting, cost accounting or budget accounting.
A specific trade account for recording debits and credits to general accounting, cost accounting or budget accounting.
A specific trade account for recording debits and credits to general accounting, cost accounting or budget accounting.
A component of pricing, such as an allowance or charge for trade purposes.
A correction or modification to reflect actual financial conditions.
A card used to represent a financial account for a trade settlement.
Terms and conditions by which payment has been or will be made for trade purposes.
A charge made for a logistics related service.
The monetary summation totals specified for this line trade settlement.
A tax subtotal calculated for this header trade settlement.
A trade transaction referenced in this line trade settlement.

referencedBy.comment: A line trade settlement specified for this supply chain trade line item.
